plot: This documentary records the disappearing traditional music of the Miyako Islands, about 300km southwest from the city of Naha on the Okinawa mainland.
title: Sketches of Myahk
plot_es: This documentary records the disappearing traditional music of the Miyako Islands, about 300km southwest from the city of Naha on the Okinawa mainland.
plot_en: This documentary records the disappearing traditional music of the Miyako Islands, about 300km southwest from the city of Naha on the Okinawa mainland.
